children: Bring brake and transmission fluids to a
Put brake and transmission fluids in a sealed container that is 5-gallons or less.
For more information, call our household hazards line at (206) 296-4692. Hours are 9 a.m. – 4:30 p.m., Monday through Friday.
Don’t pour brake and transmission fluids down drains or toilets, down storm drains, or into soil. These all cause water pollution.
